As far as our replies are concerned then we reply immediately. Just call us on  ✆ 9811386924 and we will find ourselves active from the next side always. Then after picking your offer we visit your location within 30 minutes. Then after taking a maximum of one hour or lesser than it. We always discuss the cost of repairing initially. It means there is no way of any hidden cost. Whatever problem your mobile phone has we charge accordingly. So keep it in your mind that you must always consider the cost first. [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text animation=”animate-when-visible” css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]

Although, we can fix your phone at your doorsteps, but sometimes we can not carry huge machines with us. That is why we provide pick and drop mobile repair services. We always prefer to repair the mobile phones at our mobile repair shop in Aditya Mall Indirapuram for better work.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”color” bg_color=”#fff2ec” padding_top=”60px” padding_bottom=”60px” el_class=”Device wdthfull”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text animation=”animate-when-visible” css_animation=”bottom-to-top”]
